settings.heading: The superfood shake that packs a punch
settings.text:
A convenient shake to support your active lifestyle with
13 superfoods and 31g of protein. Oh, and it’s delicious.

Only £1.99 per meal.

settings.text: “This is hands down the best shake out there. I’ve tried multiple brands in the past but nothing compares to Whole Supp. Both chocolate and vanilla tastes as amazing...”

settings.text: “Amazing product that gives you a strong level of healthy nutrition and protein. This is important when balancing work life, a young family and the ability to train optimally...”

settings.heading: Us vs Them
settings.text: We never shy away from competition. And when we put the industry under the microscope, the facts speak for themselves.

settings.heading: Led by science from farm to formulation
settings.text: Science doesn’t mess around. And neither do we. We work with leading experts in the fields of nutrition, science, medicine, and wellness so you can fuel good to feel great — daily.

settings.heading: Put your order on autopilot & save 10%

settings.heading: Good for you and the planet
settings.text: We’re all about transparency. And we’ve made a promise that nothing in Whole Supp will ever harm you or the planet.
